data.eml:eml: An annotated list of fish parasites (Copepoda, Monogenea, Digenea, Cestoda and Nematoda) collected from Emperors and Emperor Bream (Lethrinidae) in New Caledonia further highlights parasite biodiversity estimates on coral reef fish

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Justine, Jean-Lou, Beveridge, Ian, Boxshall, Geoffrey A., Bray, Rod A. (2010): An annotated list of fish parasites (Copepoda, Monogenea, Digenea, Cestoda and Nematoda) collected from Emperors and Emperor Bream (Lethrinidae) in New Caledonia further highlights parasite biodiversity estimates on coral reef fish. Zootaxa 2691: 1-40, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.199564
